briefTitle: Light-CT in the Diagnosis of Breast Tumor and Lymph Node
officialTitle: Achieving Rapid Diagnosis During Breast Cancer Surgery Using Light-CT (High-resolution Full-field Optical Coherence Tomography and Dynamic Cell Imaging)
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Patients planning to undergoing breast surgery/surgical lymph node staging.
* Specimen could be obtained.

Exclusion Criteria:

* Prior open biopsy
